none: Alaskan landscape with a sled pulled by Huskies in the foreground and mountains and trees in the background.  Large cactus dahlias surround the title.  Pink and green print.

The king of expositions is the A. Y. P.
Front cover states that this song is a: "march song, written and composed expressly for the A. Y. P. Exposition".
